alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hyde and southeastern Beaufort Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pamlico Beach, or 26 miles east of River Road, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sladesville, Ransomville, Scranton, Ponzer, Pamlico Beach, Leechville, Winsteadville, Rose Bay, Sidney Crossroads, Swan Quarter Ferry Terminal and Sydney Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
